spell_tooltip.description:
A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 50% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 135,572 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 52,428 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 64,105 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Causes the targeted enemy to cower in fear and up to 5 additional enemies within 8 yards to flee.
Targets are disoriented for 8 sec.
Revenge has a 20% chance to immediately refund 50% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 110,810 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Rage.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Raise your shield, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 25% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 68,630 damage and stunning all enemies within 16 yards for 2 sec.
Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 12% and Leech increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 393,095 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 613,963 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar or Shield Wall grants 4 sec of the other.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 1.6 million damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 4.7 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 243,137 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 20% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 108,098 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Revenge deals 10% more damage, or 20% more damage when your successful dodges or parries have made it cost no Rage.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 88,759 Physical damage instantly and an additional 206,271 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Revenge damage increased by 10% and Revenge increases the damage of your next Thunder Clap by 20%.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
Last Stand's cooldown is reduced by 60 sec and it grants you the Shield Block effect for its duration.
You gain 2% Haste for each enemy or ally within 10 yards, up to 8% Haste.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Shield Wall gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 60 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage to it and 363,038 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.
Shield Charge critical strike chance and critical strike damage increased by 20% and Shield Charge increases your auto-attack damage and speed by 10% for 20 sec.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Unleash a series of precise and powerful strikes against your target, dealing 2.5 million damage to it, and 1.5 million damage to enemies within 8 yds of it. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

While channeling Demolish, you take 10% less damage and are immune to stuns, knockbacks, and forced movement effects.

You can block, parry, dodge, and use certain defensive abilities while channeling Demolish.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 10 times.

Shield Slam grants a stack of Colossal Might and Revenge grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Revenge, and Whirlwind deal 3% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Revenge by 7% per stack.
Damage prevented by each use of Ignore Pain is increased by 20%.

Shield Slam and Revenge damage increased by 10%.

Shield Slam generates an additional 3 Rage.
Shield Slam critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 20% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Leech increased by 3%.
Run at high speed toward an ally, intercepting all melee and ranged attacks against them for 6 sec while they remain within 10 yds.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 53,615 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 64,347 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 110,878 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 5 Rage.

If you have Rend, Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 1.6 million damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 4.7 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 247,126 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 20% for 8 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 108,510 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Defensive Stance additionally reduces magic damage you take by 6%.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Using Shield Slam increases the damage of Shield Slam by 10% and the block value of your shield by 5% for 16 sec. Stacking up to 3 times.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.

Devastate deals 20% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Devastator deals 10% increased damage and generates 2 Rage.

Wounds the target, causing 89,123 Physical damage instantly and an additional 206,271 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Execute cost no Rage, be usable on any target regardless of their health, and deal damage as if you spent 40 Rage.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
You are able to block spells for 30 sec.
You gain 2% Haste for each enemy or ally within 10 yards, up to 8% Haste.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
Shield Slam reduces the remaining cooldown of Shield Wall by 6 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 24% and your Block value by 48%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 1.1 million Physical damage to it and 363,038 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Demoralizing Shout also generates 20 Rage and increases damage you deal to affected targets by 20%.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.
Every 250 rage you spend triggers a Violent Outburst, causing your next Shield Slam or Thunder Clap to deal 200% increased damage, generate 50% more Rage and grant Ignore Pain.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 1.4 million Physical damage to all enemies over 9.7 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

Stormstrike or Nature damage your abilities deal is increased by 5%. Stormstrike damage ignores Armor.

Thunder Clap damage increased by 40%. 

Seismic Reverberations now affects Thunder Clap in addition to Whirlwind.
Lightning Strikes also deal 67,131 to enemies near their target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Shield Slam damage increased by 15%.

Demoralizing Shout reduces damage enemies deal to you by an additional 5%.

Shield Slam and Bloodthirst have a 35% chance to grant you Thunder Blast, stacking up to 2 charges.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals 40% increased damage as Stormstrike and generates 7 Rage.
Intervening a target grants them a shield for 5 sec that absorbs magic damage equal to 3 times your Armor.

talent.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell.name: Keep Your Feet on the Ground

spell_tooltip.description:
Physical damage taken reduced by 2%.

Thunder Blast reduces damage you take by 8% for 5 sec.
Thunder Blast calls down a Lightning Strike on an enemy it hits.

Lightning Strikes generate 3 Rage.

Revenge and Execute damage increased by 25%.
Lightning Strikes have a 15% chance to make your next 2 Shield Slams have no cooldown.

Casting Avatar grants you 2 charges of Thunder Blast and resets the cooldown of Thunder Clap.

While Avatar is not active, Lightning Strikes have a 10% chance to grant you Avatar for 4 secs.

Thunder Blast
Your next Thunder Clap becomes a Thunder Blast that deals Stormstrike damage.

Shield Slam deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Revenge deals 25% increased damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind or Revenge hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While wielding two-handed weapons your damage is increased by 6% and damage taken from area of effect attacks is reduced by 4%.
Critical strike chance increased by 1% and critical strike damage of Execute increased by 5%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 8% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 388,945 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 613,963 physical damage over 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Increases the duration of Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect by 2.0 sec and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effect causes enemies to take 20% increased damage from all your bleeds.
Activating Avatar grants 8 sec of Sweeping Strikes and while Avatar is active the cooldown of Cleave is reduced by 1.5 sec.
A vicious strike that deals 1.5 million Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.
Overpower the enemy, dealing 663,822 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
You are healed for 110% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Execute cost no Rage, be usable on any target regardless of their health, and deal damage as if you spent 40 Rage.
If Cleave or Whirlwind hits 2 or more targets you also Slam your primary target.
You have a 1.0% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 677,358 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10%.

Wounds the target, causing 278,311 Physical damage instantly and an additional 373,368 Bleed damage over 15 sec.

Thunder Clap affects 5 nearby targets with Rend.
Every 10 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Avatar and Shield Wall by 1 sec.
When Sweeping Strikes ends, your next Cleave or Whirlwind deals 25% increased damage for each ability used during Sweeping Strikes that damaged a second target.
Strikes all enemies in front of you for 586,081 Physical damage, inflicting Deep Wounds. Cleave will consume your Overpower effect to deal increased damage. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Overpower causes a seismic wave, dealing 113,743 damage to all enemies in a 10 yd line. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Colossus Smash increases your Haste by 10%, or by 20% if the target is below 35% health. Lasts for the duration of Colossus Smash.
Colossus Smash damage increased by 30% and its effect duration is increased by 3.0 sec.
Execute is usable on targets below 35% health.
Increases Versatility by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Die by the Sword by 30.0 sec.
Critical Strike chance increased by 2% and Execute immediately refunds 20% of the Rage spent.

Deep Wounds, Rend and Thunderous Roar's Bleed effects last 6.0 sec longer and have a 5% increased critical strike chance.

If you have Rend, Mortal Strike inflicts Rend on targets below 35% health.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 2.8 million Physical damage over 4.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.
Your Mortal Strike, Cleave and Execute critical strike damage is increased by 10% and your Execute has a 5% increased critical hit chance.
Execute increases Execute's damage dealt by 3% for 12 sec, stacking up to 15 times.
Every other time Bladestorm or Ravager deal damage, you automatically cast a Bloodthirst at your target or random nearby enemy.
Whirlwind and Cleave deal 50% increased damage during Ravager or for 9 sec after Bladestorm ends.
Execute causes the target to take 35% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.
Heroic Leap reduces the cooldown of Charge by 5 sec and Charge reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 2 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Your next Rampage after Bladestorm ends deals 50% additional damage.
When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your next Raging Blow deals 20% additional damage and 20% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 834,597 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 16%.

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 50% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 131,354 damage and healing you for 20% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 53,560 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards and resetting the remaining cooldown on Taunt.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 64,398 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Revenge has a 20% chance to immediately refund 50% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 109,927 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
